title: Data Type Debugger
description: Write a program that declares and initializes variables of different data types (integer, float, string, boolean) and then prints out their values and data types. Ensure the variables are named appropriately to reflect their contents.
sample_output:
Variable: age, Value: 25, Type: int
Variable: height, Value: 1.75, Type: float
Variable: name, Value: John Doe, Type: str
Variable: isAdmin, Value: True, Type: bool
